Pudding

KEY LIME PROTEIN PUDDING

A tangy and refreshing key lime protein pudding with 23g of protein. A taste of the tropics in every bite.

23g
Protein
200
Calories
5m
Total Time
2
Yield

Nutrition per 1 serving

Carbs15g
Fat6g
Fiber1g
Sugar8g
DifficultyEasy

INGREDIENTS

  • 60g vanilla whey protein powder
  • 240g plain Greek yogurt
  • 60ml unsweetened almond milk
  • 30ml key lime juice
  • 1 tsp lime zest
  • 5g stevia or other sweetener to taste

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Combine Ingredients

In a bowl, whisk together the protein powder, Greek yogurt, almond milk, key lime juice, lime zest, and sweetener.

2

Mix Until Smooth

Continue whisking until the mixture is completely smooth and no lumps remain.

3

Chill

Cover and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the pudding to set.

4

Serve

Divide the pudding into two servings.

5

Garnish

Top with a sprinkle of lime zest and a dollop of whipped cream.

PRO TIPS

üí°

Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days.

üí°

For best results, use a kitchen scale to measure ingredients in grams.

üí°

Let cool completely before storing to prevent sogginess.
